trans-unit.source: Enables Compensating Resource Manger (CRM) on the tagged application.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.CompensatingResourceManager.ApplicationCrmEnabledAttribute"></xref> class, setting the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.CompensatingResourceManager.ApplicationCrmEnabledAttribute.Value*> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.CompensatingResourceManager.ApplicationCrmEnabledAttribute"></xref> class, optionally setting the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.CompensatingResourceManager.ApplicationCrmEnabledAttribute.Value*> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to enable Compensating Resource Manager (CRM); otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Enables or disables Compensating Resource Manager (CRM) on the tagged application.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if CRM is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
